testcase.purpose: Check if SharedWorkerNavigator.platform can return the name of the platform.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: pathname.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: postMessage can send binary data.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: postMessage can send structured data.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: onMessage can receive binary data.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: onMessage can receive structure data.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope API: importScripts() can throw exception when importing an existent but unsupported format file.
Check if shared worker object can be constructed with name.
Check if shared worker can throw exception when constructing object with an invalid URL.
Check if WorkerNavigator.platform can return the name of the platform.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decomposition IDL attribute: search.
Check if SharedWorkerNavigator appName can return the name of the browser.
Check if onerror method of shared worker can be invoked when the JS file that is used to construct the shared worker object doesn't exist.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope API: importScripts() can work correctly.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: hash.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: hostname.
Check if addEventListener method of shared worker can work correctly.
Check if the postMessage() method can work correctly when the target port is entangled with source port.
Check if shared worker can work correctly.
Check if ports is read-only.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation object can return the absolute URL set when it is created.
Check if shared worker objects created by different names are distinct instances.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: protocol.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope API: setInterval() can work correctly.
Check if Worker always assumes the resource file to be JavaScript, regardless of the MIME type.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: port.
Check if AbstractWorker terminate() can clear the event queue.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation href attribute can return the absolute URL that the WorkerLocation object represents.
Check if ErrorEvent message attribute can represent the error message.
Check if AbstractWorker ErrorEvent.type can represent the error type.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: hash.
Check if WorkerNavigator appName can return the name of the browser.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: search.
Check if SharedWorkerNavigator.userAgent can return the complete User-Agent header.
Check if WorkerLocation.search can work correctly with empty fragment.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation.search can work correctly with fragment.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: hostname.
Check if postMessage(): clone can clone a port correctly.
Check if shared worker object can be constructed correctly.
Check if WorkerLocation.search can work correctly with no query component.
Check if WorkerNavigator.userAgent can return the complete User-Agent header.
Check if WorkerNavigator.onLine can represent whether the browser is online.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: host.
Check if SharedWorkerNavigator appVersion can return the version of the browser.
Check if WorkerLocation href attribute can return the absolute URL that the WorkerLocation object represents.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: host.
Check if WorkerLocation.search can work correctly with fragment.
Check if WorkerLocation.hash can work correctly with no fragment.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope ErrorEvent.message can work correctly.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation.hash can work correctly with no fragment.
Check if SharedWorkerNavigator.onLine can work correctly.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation.hash can work correctly with url encoding string.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: protocol.
Check if basic function of Web Workers can work correctly.
Check if basic usage of worker name can work correctly.
Check if postMessage MessageEvent can work correctly.
Check if WorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: pathname.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation.search can work correctly with no component.
Check if WorkerLocation.hash can work correctly with url encoding string.
Check if SharedWorkerLocation URL can decompose IDL attribute: port.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope Close() can clear events queue.
Check if WorkerNavigator appVersion can return the version of the browser.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope_setTimeout can work correctly.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope attribute navigator can work correctly.
Check if Worker constructor can work correctly.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: onmessage can work correctly.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope method: postMessage can work correctly.
Check if SharedWorkerGlobalScope attribute: name can return the worker name.
Check if WorkerGlobalScope attribute: self can return WorkerGlobalScope object itself.
Check if SharedWorkerGlobalScope method: onconnect can work correctly.
Check if Web Worker support Blob url
check if throw exception when creating SharedWorker with different URLs but same name
check if WorkerGlobalScope XMLHttpRequest support
check if postMessage() with WorkerNavigator raises DATA_CLONE_ERR
check if Access simultaneously-loaded instance of shared worker.
check if MessageChannel port.onmessage enables message queue

check if WorkerLocation object

check if WorkerGlobalScope implements EventTarget
